Desc.entry: Museums Sheffield: Millennium Gallery is a venue for the visual arts, crafts and design in the heart of the city. Shows exhibitions from partner organisations such as the V&A and Tate and a showcase for the best in craft and design, the gallery is also home to the city's significant metalwork and Ruskin collections. The gallery also has a caf√© and gift shop.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon-Sat 8am-5pm (exhibitions from 10am), Sun 11am-5pm. Open until 8pm every Wed until 23rd December 2009

category.entry: ART GALLERIES, ART WORKSHOPS AND STUDIOS FOR HIRE
